item.description:
Calling all Sportbike Riders, please join us for 1 or 2 fun filled track day(s)at New Hampshire Motor Speedway, 1122 Rt 106 North, Loudon NH.

Everything you need to know about riding gear, bike preparation and what to expect is discussed in the below pasted hyperlinks.

http://www.tonystrackdays.com/category/3640/overview-and-read-first-please.htm

http://www.tonystrackdays.com/category/3375/rider-preparation.htm

http://www.tonystrackdays.com/category/99/bike-preparation.htm

http://www.tonystrackdays.com/category/95/general-information.htm

Because Tony's has a relationship with Penguin racing, you can mention Penguin racing to recieve a discount on your hotel stay.

Recommended Hotels:

Fairfield Inn by Marriott 603-224-4011 ($79/night - mention Penguin) - The best deal and good hotel

Red Roof Inn (10% for Penguin Students) 603-225-8399

Hampton Inn Concord/Bow 603-224-5322 x506 (20% off - mention Penguin Racing School @ time of registration)

I only recently started doing trackdays after riding for 20 years and must admit what was I thinking for not doing these sooner. I'm hooked and will say with confidence so will you. We look forward to seeing you on the track.
item.name: Tony's track day(s) - June 18th & 19th @ NH Motor Speedway
